PATIENT_ID: TEST_VASC_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-21 08:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-21 08:10:00
Category II activation for 60-year-old male, fall from standing height.
Left hip pain. No external bleeding. No signs of internal bleeding.
BP 140/85, HR 76, RR 14, GCS 15. Hemodynamically stable.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-21 08:30:00
Left hip fracture confirmed on imaging. Neurovascular status intact.
Orthopedic consultation obtained. Admit for surgical repair.
